SEARCH
Package view

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
view.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI
public class Cli extends Object implements UI
This class represents a Command Line Interface (CLI) for the user interface. It implements the UI interface.

    • askConnection

      public int askConnection()
      Asks the user to choose the connection method for the game.
      Specified by:
      askConnection in interface UI
      Returns:
      The selected connection method (1 for RMI, 2 for Socket).

      public int askGUI()
      Asks the user to choose the user interface for the game.
      Returns:
      The selected user interface (1 for GUI, 2 for TUI).

    • askNewChatMessage

      public List<String> askNewChatMessage(List<String> playersName, String myplayername)
      Prompts the user to enter a new chat message and select the recipient.
      Parameters:
      playersName - The list of player names.
      myplayername - The name of the current player.
      Returns:
      A list containing the selected recipient and the entered message.

    • askTilesToPick

      public List<Integer> askTilesToPick(int numberOfTile)
      Prompts the user to choose the tiles they want to pick based on the specified number of tiles.
      Specified by:
      askTilesToPick in interface UI
      Parameters:
      numberOfTile - The number of tiles the user needs to pick.
      Returns:
      A list of integers representing the x and y coordinates of the chosen tiles.
